casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the IRREVOCABLE TRUST OF JOHN L. MARCHISOTTO M-1044 September Term 2018
M-1045 September Term 2018
082607 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 3, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of John Marchisotto for a stay (M-1044) is dismissed as moot; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal (M-1045) is denied.
